name: The Nightmare - Ludum Dare 47
description:
Premise

With no idea where you are, you must search for clues on how to escape the labyrinth. Be wary of the being that lurks around these parts and find a way to escape the loop you’re seemingly stuck in. The path out may not be as obvious as it seems.

Control:
W - A - S - D: Movement
Shift: Run
Space: Interact

Software:

  • Maya
  • Blender
  •  Unity
  •  Adobe Photoshop
  •  Substance Painter
  •  Substance Designer
  •  GitKraken
  •  Audacity

For the best experience, consider turning off the lights and using headphones.

Resources

Freesound and Zapsplat
-Soundtrack and SFX

 -Creature auto rig and animation
